name: linux_relevant_folder_check
pattern: {"platform": "linux", "description": "ATT&CK: T1158,T1100 ", "queries": {"home_dir_check": {"query": "SELECT hash.sha1, fi.path, fi.filename, datetime(fi.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(fi.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(fi.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(fi.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime FROM hash JOIN file fi USING (path) where ((fi.path like '/home/%/%') OR (fi.path like '/home/%') OR (fi.path like '/home/%/.%')OR (fi.path like '/home/.%'));", "interval": 600, "description": "Lists files and directories under all home user dir - ATT&CK: T1158,T1100"}, "root_dir_check": {"query": "SELECT hash.sha1, fi.path, fi.filename, datetime(fi.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(fi.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(fi.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(fi.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime FROM hash JOIN file fi USING (path) where ((fi.path like '/root/%/%') OR (fi.path like '/root/%') OR (fi.path like '/root/%/.%')OR (fi.path like '/root/.%'));", "interval": 600, "description": "Lists files and directories under root dir - ATT&CK: T1158,T1100"}, "var_www_dir_check": {"query": "SELECT hash.sha1, fi.path, fi.filename, datetime(fi.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(fi.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(fi.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(fi.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime FROM hash JOIN file fi USING (path) where ((fi.path like '/var/www/%/%') OR (fi.path like '/var/www/%/.%')OR (fi.path like '/var/www/.%') OR (fi.path like '/var/www/.%'));", "interval": 600, "description": "Lists files and directories under www dir - ATT&CK: T1158,T1100"}, "tmp_dir_check": {"query": "SELECT hash.sha1, fi.path, fi.filename, datetime(fi.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(fi.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(fi.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(fi.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime FROM hash JOIN file fi USING (path) where ((fi.path like '/tmp/%/%') OR (fi.path like '/tmp/.%')OR (fi.path like '/tmp/%'));", "interval": 600, "description": "Lists files and directories under tmp dir - ATT&CK: T1158,T1100"}, "YOURIMPDIR1_dir_check": {"query": "SELECT hash.sha1, fi.path, fi.filename, datetime(fi.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(fi.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(fi.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(fi.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime FROM hash JOIN file fi USING (path) where ((fi.path like '/YOURIMPDIR1/%/%') OR (fi.path like '/YOURIMPDIR1/%%/.%') OR (fi.path like '/YOURIMPDIR1/.%') OR (fi.path like '/YOURIMPDIR1/%'));", "interval": 600, "description": "Lists files and directories under YOURIMPDIR1 dir -
